aka: The Precocious and Brief Life of Sabina Rivas

cast.name: 安吉丽娜·佩拉兹 Angelina Peláez
扎伊德·西尔维娅·古铁雷斯 Zaide Silvia Gutiérrez

director.name: 路易斯·曼多基 Luis Mandoki

this_title: La vida precoz y breve de Sabina Rivas
trans_title: The Precocious and Brief Life of Sabina Rivas
introduction: In the Mexican-Guatemalan border, young teenage lovers, Sabina and Jovany, both Hondurans, accidentally meet again after some years without seeing each other. She plans to get to the United States and dreams about being a great singer; he commits all the required atrocities to be accepted by the gang: la Mara Salvatrucha. Sabina and Jovany crashed with the most adverse conditions at the border like white slavery, the Mexican and American migratory agents Burrona and Patrick, the brothel matron Doña Lita, Don Nico the Mexican Consul in Tecún Umán, the drug trafficking networks, the army and la Mara Salvatrucha
foreign_title: La vida precoz y breve de Sabina Rivas
